overview.ovdesc: This is a live file updated when drawings are made under multi product facility

desc.p: This holds Product type of the drawings made under the FACILITY.
This holds tranche code of the drawings made under the FACILITY
This holds the date on which the drawings made under the FACILITY
This holds the ID of the drawings made under the FACILITY
This holds the currency of the FACILITY contract
This is the id of FACILITY
This holds amount utilised in the drawings made under the FACILITY
